attributes.action: Make it illegal for anyone to make a phone call without leaving their phone number to do away with nuisance calls
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To stop people having their lives ruin by phone calls from ex-wives/husbands or ex-girlfriends/boyfriends or anyone else who thinks they can have a bit of fun.If there is nothing to hide then they do not have to hide their number.
